title: percent health runes
body: Does anybody know if the cinderhulk's percent health buff and the hp percent runes work together?

replies.body:
Well Cinderhulk works only with **bonus** (health gained from items, buffs, items, runes and masteries) health while the %health runes, are calculated based on total health
so say you have cinderhulk, randuins and warmogs 300+500+800 = 1500 +2149 base hp at lvl 18 on {{champion:44}} (becasue taric jungle is truly outragous) you have 3649hp +25% of 1500 = 375 (cinderhulk bonus based on items only)

this gives you 4024hp then you factor in the runes that give 4.5% max hp ( or +7.5% if you have the juggernaut mastery but cbf to include that)
which gives another 181hp (which is also affected by cinderhulk to give you an extra 45hp on top of that)

this is only slightly more hp that you get from hp per lvl runes (182.25hp after cinderhulk) compared to (227.25hp after cinderhulk) for percent hp runes. 

hope this helps.
